topic.title: you cant even post pictures now i know why nobody seeds this
topic.body: what am i supposed to do, use base64?

topic.title: solution
topic.body: we should just use zerome lol

1535162782_1NVpW6BGgWn3oPYAjvsVjyHoBqApQ.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk]
I've tried a few of those already and ouch..
I've got an idea: use base64, encoding it to "upload" and automatically decoding it as an image tag

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_2_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): interesting idea, maybe it would have less security issues than securing file upload, unsure, but bigger issue is that there is probably no programmer to implement it (unless you know or can find some).

I am one! and i've made a prototype of this idea.
Though now i'm thinking i have a better idea lol

1535486629_1NVpW6BGgWn3oPYAjvsVjyHoBqApQ.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_3_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Please create board on Millchan: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aAit will allow like minded people to gather in it and post their content on one place in topics.
